PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03402019-04-12,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Venezuela) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (VENEZUELA) REGULATIONS in order to add 43 individuals to the Schedule of listed persons in the Regulations and to (1) respond to the ongoing anti-democratic actions of the Maduro regime; (2) send a message to members of the Government of Venezuela that their anti-democratic actions have consequences; (3) demonstrate to Canadians more broadly that the Government is prepared to take action when regional norms of democratic good governance are flouted; and (4) show solidarity with the actions of like minded countries in the hemisphere.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0106 Publication Date: 2019-05-01
AttachmentsAttachment
